Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>はどう思ってるのか知らないけど、 やっぱり<Tytree>って<Hilda>のコト……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not sure what Hilda thinks about you, but you sure have a thing for her...

Entry.JapaneseText: だ、だから……おれはおばさんには キョーミないって言ってるだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: B-But... Didn't I say that I'm not interested in old ladies?

Entry.JapaneseText: そっかなぁ……<Eugene>はどう思う？
Entry.EnglishText: I see... What do you think, <Eugene>?

Entry.JapaneseText: そういう見方もあるが、俺が思うに、<Tytree>は <Hilda>の中に姉の姿を見ているのだろう……
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps that's one way to look at it, but in my mind, I think <Tytree> sees a bit of his sister in <Hilda>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、なるほどネ！ <Tytree>はシスコンだもんネ！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, I get it! <Tytree> <Italic>is</Italic> a siscon after all!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえ、その言い方やめろよな！
